column5: So, used to be, right click on the image, select properties and you could select the image to paste in the image link on OFC. Since the upgrade to photobucket, that method doesnt seem to work. Anyone else experiencing this? Anybody who can point me to a solution?
big changes you go to the top right corner of  the photo and click  on the cog click on share  click on links click on the bo ne you ant, most likely direct
Yes it's changed. You now click on the little cog/gear in the top right of the thumbnail. Then on the menu that comes up click on get links.

Is that for mobile or pc ?? I always use my iPhone to upload my pics to ofc from photobucket and it's always been great ... So why would they change it when there was never any issues with it?? Grrrr figures eh.....
They've made a lot of changes to various formats. Most annoying are the continuous stream of adds that follow each upload. They also removed the bulk upload that allowed a group a pics at once.

They went and messed up a good thing is what they did. Now it frustrates me, and I can't see any pics on any websites that are uploaded to PB. I'm no techie, but if anyone knows how to make it work, please let me know!  S.
has anyone tried downloading a photo? I tried from my own album and keep getting the message the file has been deleted or moved, even when I have the picture open?
Think I may have sussed this part - I had to "opt in" to the new site. what a PITA.  Almost like selecting the wrong skin and being locked out of a forum

I can't remember how I did it? But I initially switched to the new photobucket and hated it. Then somehow I was able to switch back to the old photobucket.  Wish I could tell you how, but I honestly can't remember???  original photobucket was 10X better IMO

yeah, I did that for a while - but they dont support that anymore - have ou tried using (uploading or linking to pictures ) it lately? ended up spending a lot of time on the "how do ...?I" page. definitely  not an improvement - kinda like vista compared to xp.....
What are you guys actually having problems with?   Getting links from pictures has never been easier when viewing your library with the beta.

I also had a few issues  when I 1st switched over to the new format a month ago, but now that I've got it figured out for the most part, I actually like it better than the old version, and find it quite easy to use.
Some will never accept change. I like the new one
Just press down control while selecting
